type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Particle In Radius

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/particle_in_radius).

Checks whether the player has a specified number of particles that match a specified particle effect(s) in a specified radius. The radius originates at the center of the entity with this condition.

Type ID: `apugli:particle_in_radius`



---

### ⚠️ Caution

This condition is only effective client-side. That means any server-sided power types will not work as intended.



---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:entity_in_radius",
    "condition": {
        "type": "apoli:entity_type",
        "entity_type": "minecraft:creeper"
    },
    "radius": 5.0,
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 1
}
```
This condition checks whether the entity is near at least one creeper within 5x the size of their hurtbox.

particle.description: The particle effect to match with the checked particles.
particle.markdownDescription: The particle effect to match with the checked particles.

particles.description: The particle effects to match with the checked particles.
particles.markdownDescription: The particle effects to match with the checked particles.

radius.description: The radius to check the particles that match the specified particle effect within.
radius.markdownDescription: The radius to check the particles that match the specified particle effect within.

comparison.description: How the amount of particles within the specified radius which are the specified should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the amount of particles within the specified radius which are the specified should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the amount to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the amount to.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Particle in Radius (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-03-05

Particle In Radius

Entity Condition Type.

Checks whether the player has a specified number of particles that match a specified particle effect(s) in a specified radius. The radius originates at the center of the entity with this condition.

Type ID: apugli:particle_in_radius

!!! caution

This condition is only effective client-side. That means any server-sided power types will not work as intended.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
particle Particle Effect optional The particle effect to match with the checked particles.
particles Array of Particle Effects optional The particle effects to match with the checked particles.
radius Float The radius to check the particles that match the specified particle effect within.
comparison Comparison ">=" How the amount of particles within the specified radius which are the specified should be compared to the specified value.
compare_to Integer 1 The value to compare the amount to.

Example

"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:entity_in_radius",
    "condition": {
        "type": "apoli:entity_type",
        "entity_type": "minecraft:creeper"
    },
    "radius": 5.0,
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 1
}

This condition checks whether the entity is near at least one creeper within 5x the size of their hurtbox.
